Articles.Content: Making new parts takes time don't forget, you've been patient this long, don't worry

How is it that the cargo bags may not be ready for 0.90!? If the code is already implemented and everyone at SQUAD is way more interested in generating pretty 3d models than coding... What's the hold up!? This is stuff that was supposed to be ready for 0.25!

Seriously, this is getting nuts.

You're sounding very entitled, they work on this game for us as hard as they can and release content as it is ready.

I'd certainly rather wait and have them done right. It's not like 0.90 is going to be completely void of other things to do. It's certainly the biggest feature list I've seen in KSP history and I'm not sure we know all of them yet. What's on the list so far? Fine Print, Mk 3, Upgradable Buildings, Biomes, Gizmos UI, Parts UI, I feel like I'm forgetting something.

EDIT: Kerbal Experience! Knew I was forgetting something.

Edited November 26, 2014 by Alshain
Just Awesome!

You're sounding very entitled, they work on this game for us as hard as they can and release content as it is ready.

Any criticism can be accused of "sounding entitled", and frankly due to the decisions SQUAD has made re: 0.90, you aren't going to get content as it is ready. Kerbal experience, biomes, gizmos and those spaceplane parts are going to sit finished or nearly finished behind the wall until upgradable buildings, the rest of the Mk3 parts, and who knows what else is ready to be rolled out.

I'm really just tired of this cycle. It's why I don't recommend people purchase this game anymore. I keep hoping it will change, but it never does.

Times are changing, there's less behind-the-scenes code to do which leaves more time for content, but I'll let 0.90.0 speak for itself when it is released

Also, less of the "entitled" talk please, concerns about the game are not the same as being entitled.

Edited November 26, 2014 by sal_vager

Times are changing, there's less behind-the-scenes code to do which leaves more time for content, but I'll let 0.90.0 speak for itself when it is released

This, I imagine they want to release .90 with a bang. Beta is a pretty big milestone (even if it is arbitrary), but i'd consider a KSP a Beta game right now, it doesn't look anything like the really old screenshots.

Besides, I want time to play with all the mods I installed before I have to get rid of em because they may break with the new version (Or not, maybe RSS with 6.4x kerbol, DRE, FAR, and numerous informational mods won't break by some miracle.)

I'll just wait, they're adding a LOT of game changing features (They basically redid the entire VAB), kerbal experience, these parts need balancing etc. so I don't mind if it takes a while for 0.90 to come out.

Just gives me more time to plan out this mission to 6.4x Duna. (Or, I might just be bold and go near Eeloo, I've actually never gone there, not even with stock)

You know, they also said that cargo bays might not of been ready for .25, and yet here they are today. If squad is hard at work with something, don't throw out the possibility that they still could make the deadline.

Although if I had a choice, I would prefer that landing gear would be added over cargo bays, as large landing gear may even be required to even get these large planes off the ground.

Simple - just delay 0.90 until they're done. Don't care when it comes, but having the awesome Mk3 parts with no cargo bay or suitable landing gear will be... frustrating. But yeah, excellent work on the parts. Ya done good, son.

Can't underscore this enough. No sense in releasing something if it's not done.

Can't underscore this enough. No sense in releasing something if it's not done.

...he says, about a game that isnt even in Beta yet...
I've been waiting a long time for this an I must honestly say........ PERFECT, THESE PARTS ARE PERFECT! OH MY GOD IT'S AMAZING!

...he says, about a game that isnt even in Beta yet...

Even when the game isn't/is Beta, this doesn't mean devs should release half-done "updates"...

Edited November 26, 2014 by Dreamixpl

Can't underscore this enough. No sense in releasing something if it's not done.

I second that. I can wait for cool stuff a bit longer if I have to. Mk3's don't seem so much fun without cargo bays and landing gear.

Simple - just delay 0.90 until they're done. Don't care when it comes, but having the awesome Mk3 parts with no cargo bay or suitable landing gear will be... frustrating. But yeah, excellent work on the parts. Ya done good, son.

Anyone else get a look at the new landing gear right at the bottom of the pics??

Beautiful: they look like B9's.
Looks like I'll finally have to learn how to make things with wings...

Anyone else get a look at the new landing gear right at the bottom of the pics??

Beautiful: they look like B9's.

All I see is a small hard point attached to the existing gear.

I had to find something to support myself with when i saw this.

AAAAAAAWWWWWEEEEESSSSSOOOOOOMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Even when the game isn't/is Beta, this doesn't mean devs should release half-done "updates"...

How exactly do you determine when an update is "done"? If they release a single part, that is an update.
Anyone else getting a B9 HL vibe from these parts? They seem to be about the same shape as the HL fuselage system from B9.

Oh yeah, By the way, just gotta say,

Please please PLEEEASE make the cargo bays for 0.90!

i have such amazing plans for them! )
They look like... ...SPP style B9 parts... ...
thank god it looks like they've finally done away with offset attach points for the mk3 parts

However, Don't get too hyped just yet, I can't promise the landing gear and CargoBays will be done in time, and yes, you're of course right, the small landing gear is a bit silly on those parts. But hey, even without those, still more useful than the old parts, right?

No. I entirely disagree. Without cargo bays spaceplanes are worthless. Those parts give spaceplanes purpose; they are what makes them unique from rockets. Please, don't release this update without cargo bays! I can only speak for myself, but I would be very disappointed.

I have to agree with previous posters - please delay release a bit if its necessary to get cargo bays done. Large spaceplanes major function is to carry payload. Without bays they will be limited to carry crew (mk2/mk1 much more economical for that) and fuel.
